description: The Little Switzerland Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Little Switzerland for the snow report
Alexa, ask Little Switzerland for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Little Switzerland
shortDescription: The Little Switzerland Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Little Switzerland.
